---

├───┤
│ x │
└───┘

z
x

===============================================
encoder: csv

z
x

===============================================
encoder: html
===============================================
<table>
  <caption></caption>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th align="left">z</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td align="left">x</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

encoder: asciidoc

|x
|===
